sentences: Discussions on mitigation was taken up throughout the week in a drafting group and spinoff groups.
The focus of the discussions was the negotiating text (FCCC/AWGLCA/2010/14), which includes sections dealing with various elements of mitigation.

These are based on key paragraphs in the BAP (Decision 1/CP.13), as follows: mitigation by developed countries (BAP paragraph 1(b)(i)); mitigation by developing countries (1(b)(ii)); REDD-plus (1(b)(iii)); cooperative sectoral approaches and sector-specific actions (1(b)(iv)); approaches to enhance the cost effectiveness of mitigation actions (market mechanisms) (1(b)(v)); and consequences of response measures (1(b)(vi)).
Delegates discussed the negotiating text at length.
The section below summarizes the discussions on each of these mitigation issues.
